verses.text: \w Let|strong="G1161"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* obey \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w supreme|strong="G5242"\w* \w authorities|strong="G1849"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* exists \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* existing \w authorities|strong="G1849"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w appointed|strong="G5021"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* sets themself against \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w authorities|strong="G1849"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* resisting \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s appointment, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* resist \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w bring|strong="G2983"\w* \w a|strong="G2983"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w A|strong="G2192"\w* \w good|strong="G3756"\w* \w action|strong="G2041"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* rulers; \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w bad|strong="G2556"\w* \w action|strong="G2041"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w*. \w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w you|strong="G1510"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w reason|strong="G1537"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w authorities|strong="G1849"\w*? \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G3756"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G1510"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* win \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w servants|strong="G1249"\w* \w appointed|strong="G4160"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G1437"\w* \w good|strong="G3756"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w may|strong="G2316"\w* \w well|strong="G1063"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w carry|strong="G4160"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w without|strong="G3756"\w* meaning! \w They|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w servants|strong="G1249"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* inflict \w his|strong="G1519"\w* punishments \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w wrong|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w You|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* bound, \w therefore|strong="G1352"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* obey, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* fear \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2532"\w*’s punishments, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* matter \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w*, \w too|strong="G2532"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w reason|strong="G1223"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* paying \w taxes|strong="G5411"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* officials \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s officers, \w devoting|strong="G4342"\w* \w themselves|strong="G4342"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* special work.

\w In|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* cases pay \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G3782"\w* \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3956"\w* – \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* \w where|strong="G3956"\w* \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G3782"\w*, \w taxes|strong="G5411"\w* \w where|strong="G3956"\w* \w taxes|strong="G5411"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G3782"\w*, \w respect|strong="G5092"\w* \w where|strong="G3956"\w* \w respect|strong="G5092"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G3782"\w*, \w and|strong="G5092"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w where|strong="G3956"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G3782"\w*.

\w Owe|strong="G3784"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w to|strong="G3361"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3367"\w* \w except|strong="G1487"\w* love; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* love \w their|strong="G3588"\w* neighbour \w have|strong="G3588"\w* satisfied \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*, “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w must|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w must|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w kill|strong="G5407"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w must|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w must|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w covet|strong="G1937"\w*,” \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whatever|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w*, \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w* summed \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* – “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w must|strong="G5100"\w* love \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* love \w yourself|strong="G4572"\w*.”
Love \w never|strong="G3756"\w* wrongs \w a|strong="G3756"\w* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* love fully satisfies \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w say|strong="G1473"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* crisis \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* reached, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w has|strong="G3778"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w come|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* rouse \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w*; \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w nearer|strong="G1452"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* accepted \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w The|strong="G1161"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w almost|strong="G4298"\w* \w gone|strong="G4298"\w*; \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w near|strong="G1448"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w let|strong="G1161"\w* us \w be|strong="G3588"\w* \w done|strong="G2041"\w* \w with|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* arm ourselves \w with|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w Being|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* light \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w let|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w live|strong="G4043"\w* becomingly, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* revelry \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drunkenness|strong="G3178"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w lust|strong="G3361"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* licentiousness, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* quarrelling \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w jealousy|strong="G2205"\w*.

\w No|strong="G3361"\w*! Arm yourselves \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w spirit|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spend|strong="G4160"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* thought \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w earthly|strong="G4561"\w* nature, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w satisfy|strong="G4160"\w* its cravings.
